text:
@balajis Going viral

#edit 
What if this coronavirus is the pandemic that public health people have been #WANTING for years?

It would accelerate many pre-existing trends.

- border closures
- nationalism
- social isolation
- preppers
- remote work
- face masks
- distrust in governments
